COFFEE MATE Original Light PowderFeatures and Benefits
Classic rich and creamy flavour COFFEE-MATE® Light creates the perfect cup of velvety goodness
Around one teaspoon will transform your coffee and tea every time – morning, noon or night
COFFEE-MATE® has been keeping your tea and coffee rich and creamy tasting since 1961
40% less fat than Original per 2 g serving, lactose free COFFEE-MATE® Light pairs perfectly with a cup of NESCAFE® instant coffee
Easily recyclable, simply dispose of label then recycle container and cap

COFFEE MATE Original Light PowderIngredients
Sugars (Glucose Syrup, Sugar), Hydrogenated Palm Kernel Oil, Modified Milk Ingredients, Dipotassium Phosphate, Calcium Carbonate, Monoglycerides, DATEM, Artificial Flavour, Annatto.

In 2023, we changed our Coffee Mate Liquid shrink sleeves so that the label no longer needs to be removed and discarded prior to recycling; now the entire bottle, sleeve and cap are recyclable together and can be put into the blue box
